FuncDef: The display dpfr cache statistics command displays fault table statistics. The display dpfr cache statistics command displays fault table statistics. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display dpfr cache statistics slot <slot-id> [ chip <chip-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a chip ID.
The value is an integer. The default value is 0.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces.
